apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this loving couple emoji features two women with medium and medium-light skin tones, their hands gently clasped as a radiant, soft-edged heart hovers between them.  Apple's distinctive 3D shading and realistic lighting give their figures a warm, approachable feel, and the heart glows with a gentle, almost tangible affection. This emoji beautifully represents romantic love, partnership, and the celebration of LGBTQ+ relationships with a touch of sweetness and sincerity.
